function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Transparent communication about changing regulations and pandemic impact","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Signalling heritage and cultural identity through food and branding","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Memorializing family members in food business promotion","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close contact between service providers and customers through personal interactions and shared personal information","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sharing personal and family information with customers","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced hours and restricted services in the dining industry, including food trucks, may have increased congestion and close interactions among customers during peak hours, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Food trucks adapting service strategies during pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on social media for communication may lead to misinformation or incomplete information being shared with customers.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited presence on social media platforms may result in decreased visibility and communication with customers.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Interpretation and theory building process may lead to biases or misinterpretations in the proposed framework of service ecosystemic value co-creation.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Close proximity of food trucks at local events increases the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited dining options at the local university due to construction may lead to overcrowding and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for the spread of contagious diseases in service contexts at micro-, meso-, and macro-levels.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Physical and social aspects of servicescapes may contribute to the propagation of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Engagement with local community members and institutions can create opportunities for disease spread if proper precautions are not taken.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Service encounters as a focal element in service provision","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Servicescapes as the environments for service encounters","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Study of the contexts in which service provision takes place","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Focus on food trucks as a research context","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on data from food truck practices","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emphasis on resilience during environmental uncertainty","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases from food truck interactions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate pandemic response leading to increased disease spread","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of communication and transparency about pandemic-related changes","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid changes in the food truck business model in response to covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited research on food trucks and mobile vendors in the context of pandemic response","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased popularity of food trucks leading to higher consumer exposure to different cuisines","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Significant decline in sales and workforce layoffs in the restaurant and food services industry due to covid-19 outbreak","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased uncertainty and risks associated with dining out due to covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposing consumers to covid-19 through dining out","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited ability and willingness of consumers to continue social dining experiences","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration with local communities may lead to increased risk of contagious disease propagation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Suspected \\'greenwashing\\' in ecotourism","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of transparency in product and service production","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unbalanced relationship between human and nature","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases within the local communities and project construction site due to increased interaction and proximity.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risks associated with the transmission of zoonotic diseases from amazonian animals to humans, especially in the context of wildlife rehabilitation and conservation programs.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of inadequate sanitation and waste management practices leading to the contamination of water sources and the spread of waterborne diseases.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poorly controlled tourism development","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of respect for local traditions and landscape","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible spread of contagious diseases due to increased tourist activity in local communities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate waste management leading to environmental contamination and health hazards","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of income and control leading to development of illegal activities in the territory","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Recruitment of international staff may increase the risk of introducing contagious diseases from abroad.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incorporating students and graduates as trainees and staff may introduce contagious diseases to the lodge.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to retain and train qualified staff for managerial positions may lead to higher turnover and increase the risk of disease transmission due to frequent staff changes.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Collaboration with outsiders may introduce new contagious diseases to the local community or staff members.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High level of staff and management rotation may increase the risk of spreading contagious diseases among different groups of employees.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risk of contagious diseases spreading within the local indigenous communities due to increased contact with external populations.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The high level of uncertainty and unreliability in the availability of unskilled work within the communities","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
